feature -- Access
f_original_parent_position../implementation_interface/ev_dockable_source_i.xml#f_original_parent_positionoriginal_parent_position: FalseINTEGER_32 -- Original position in parent. Required -- to restore widget later.
f_is_dock_executing../implementation_interface/ev_dockable_source_i.xml#f_is_dock_executingis_dock_executing: FalseBOOLEAN -- Is Current in the process of a dockable transport? do Result := ../implementation_interface/ev_shared_transport_i.xml#f_source_being_dockedsource_being_docked /= Void end
f_real_source../implementation_interface/ev_dockable_source_i.xml#f_real_sourcereal_source: detachable ../interface/ev_dockable_source.xmlEV_DOCKABLE_SOURCE -- Result is EV_DOCKABLE_SOURCE which should be -- dragged when docking begins on Current.
f_is_dockable../implementation_interface/ev_dockable_source_i.xml#f_is_dockableis_dockable: FalseBOOLEAN -- Is Current dockable?
f_not_external_docking_enabled../implementation_interface/ev_dockable_source_i.xml#f_not_external_docking_enablednot_external_docking_enabled: FalseBOOLEAN -- Attribute used for is_externally_dockable. We must implement -- is_externally_dockable this way as we have no easy solution to -- assign True to is_externally_dockable.
f_is_external_docking_enabled../implementation_interface/ev_dockable_source_i.xml#f_is_external_docking_enabledis_external_docking_enabled: FalseBOOLEAN -- Is Current able to be docked into an EV_DOCKABLE_DIALOG -- When there is no valid EV_DRAGABLE_TARGET upon completion -- of the transport? do Result := not ../implementation_interface/ev_dockable_source_i.xml#f_not_external_docking_enablednot_external_docking_enabled end
f_not_is_external_docking_relative../implementation_interface/ev_dockable_source_i.xml#f_not_is_external_docking_relativenot_is_external_docking_relative: FalseBOOLEAN -- Will dockable dialog displayed when Current is docked externally -- be displayed relative to parent window of Current? -- Otherwise displayed as a standard window. -- Internal reversed value of ../implementation_interface/ev_dockable_source_i.xml#f_is_external_docking_relativeis_external_docking_relative as we cannot -- easily initialize a BOOLE to True in this case.
f_is_external_docking_relative../implementation_interface/ev_dockable_source_i.xml#f_is_external_docking_relativeis_external_docking_relative: FalseBOOLEAN -- Will dockable dialog displayed when Current is docked externally -- be displayed relative to parent window of Current? -- Otherwise displayed as a standard window. do Result := not ../implementation_interface/ev_dockable_source_i.xml#f_not_is_external_docking_relativenot_is_external_docking_relative end
feature -- Status report
f_get_next_target../implementation_interface/ev_dockable_source_i.xml#f_get_next_targetget_next_target (a_widget: ../interface/ev_widget.xmlEV_WIDGET): detachable ../interface/ev_dockable_target.xmlEV_DOCKABLE_TARGET -- Result is next dockable target that is ../implementation_interface/ev_dockable_source_i.xml#f_is_dockableis_dockable found by -- recursively seraching up the parenting structure from current_target. -- Result will be Void if none. require a_widget_not_void: a_widget /= Void local container: detachable ../interface/ev_container.xmlEV_CONTAINER target: detachable ../interface/ev_dockable_target.xmlEV_DOCKABLE_TARGET parent_widget: detachable ../interface/ev_widget.xmlEV_WIDGET do from parent_widget := a_widget.../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_parentparent container ?= parent_widget target ?= container if attached parent_widget as l_parent_widget and then attached l_parent_widget.../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_real_targetreal_target as l_real_target and then l_real_target.../interface/ev_dockable_target.xml#f_is_docking_enabledis_docking_enabled then Result := l_real_target elseif attached target as l_target and then l_target.../interface/ev_dockable_target.xml#f_is_docking_enabledis_docking_enabled then Result := l_target end until Result /= Void or container = Void loop parent_widget := container.../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_parentparent container ?= parent_widget target ?= container if parent_widget /= Void and then attached parent_widget.../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_real_targetreal_target as l_real_target and then l_real_target.../interface/ev_dockable_target.xml#f_is_docking_enabledis_docking_enabled then Result := l_real_target elseif target /= Void and then target.../interface/ev_dockable_target.xml#f_is_docking_enabledis_docking_enabled then Result := target end end ensure result_is_dockable: Result /= Void implies Result.../interface/ev_dockable_target.xml#f_is_docking_enabledis_docking_enabled end

Result is first dockable target that ../implementation_interface/ev_dockable_source_i.xml#f_is_dockableis_dockable found by recursively -- searching up through the parenting structure from the widget widget_imp_at_cursor_position := ../implementation_interface/ev_dockable_source_i.xml#f_widget_imp_at_pointer_positionwidget_imp_at_pointer_position if widget_imp_at_cursor_position /= Void then end end ensure result_is_dockable: Result /= Void implies Result.../interface/ev_dockable_target.xml#f_is_docking_enabledis_docking_enabled end

f_enable_dockable../implementation_interface/ev_dockable_source_i.xml#f_enable_dockableenable_dockable -- Allow Current to be dockable do ../implementation_interface/ev_dockable_source_i.xml#f_is_dockableis_dockable := True ../implementation_interface/ev_dockable_source_i.xml#f_internal_enable_dockableinternal_enable_dockable ensure is_dockable: ../implementation_interface/ev_dockable_source_i.xml#f_is_dockableis_dockable end

f_set_real_source../implementation_interface/ev_dockable_source_i.xml#f_set_real_sourceset_real_source (dockable_source: ../interface/ev_dockable_source.xmlEV_DOCKABLE_SOURCE) -- Set dockable_source to be the widget moved when a -- drag begins on Current. require is_dockable: ../implementation_interface/ev_dockable_source_i.xml#f_is_dockableis_dockable dockable_source_not_void: dockable_source /= Void do ../implementation_interface/ev_dockable_source_i.xml#f_real_sourcereal_source := dockable_source ensure real_source_assigned: ../implementation_interface/ev_dockable_source_i.xml#f_real_sourcereal_source = dockable_source end
f_remove_real_source../implementation_interface/ev_dockable_source_i.xml#f_remove_real_sourceremove_real_source -- Ensure ../implementation_interface/ev_dockable_source_i.xml#f_real_sourcereal_source is Void. require is_dockable: ../implementation_interface/ev_dockable_source_i.xml#f_is_dockableis_dockable do ../implementation_interface/ev_dockable_source_i.xml#f_real_sourcereal_source := Void ensure real_source_void: ../implementation_interface/ev_dockable_source_i.xml#f_real_sourcereal_source = Void end
f_enable_external_docking../implementation_interface/ev_dockable_source_i.xml#f_enable_external_dockingenable_external_docking -- Allow Current to be docked into an EV_DOCKABLE_DIALOG -- When there is no valid EV_DRAGABLE_TARGET upon completion -- of the transport? require is_dockable: ../implementation_interface/ev_dockable_source_i.xml#f_is_dockableis_dockable do ../implementation_interface/ev_dockable_source_i.xml#f_not_external_docking_enablednot_external_docking_enabled := False ensure is_externally_dockable: ../implementation_interface/ev_dockable_source_i.xml#f_is_external_docking_enabledis_external_docking_enabled end

f_disable_external_docking_relative../implementation_interface/ev_dockable_source_i.xml#f_disable_external_docking_relativedisable_external_docking_relative -- Assign False to ../implementation_interface/ev_dockable_source_i.xml#f_is_external_docking_relativeis_external_docking_relative, ensuring that -- a dockable dialog displayed when Current is docked externally -- is displayed as a standard window. require external_docking_enabled: ../implementation_interface/ev_dockable_source_i.xml#f_is_external_docking_enabledis_external_docking_enabled do ../implementation_interface/ev_dockable_source_i.xml#f_not_is_external_docking_relativenot_is_external_docking_relative := True ensure external_docking_not_relative: not ../implementation_interface/ev_dockable_source_i.xml#f_is_external_docking_relativeis_external_docking_relative end
